text:
I've patched the English and French i18n files to change to more intuitive
terms for the edit menu options.  I also removed some extraneous white space
at end of lines and converted tabs to blanks.

German, Spanish, and Italian translations are still required.
creator: jplejacq@quoininc.com

text:
Created attachment 13639
Patch to improve usability of edit menu terms for english and french.

Still need german, spanish, and italian translations.
creator: jplejacq@quoininc.com

text: i commited this to 1.2 and trunk, and added the german version.
creator: gregor@apache.org
jplejacq@quoininc.com
text:
Created attachment 13754
Patch to lenya i18n files to add xml:lang for WYSIWYG in non-english files

W3C standard recommends indicating when the language for an element differs
from the main body language.  I inadvertently left this out in the last patch.
This patch corrects this for fr, de, and es files.

The italian file still needs to be updated.
